content: Once you make your way down either of the slopes into the large sandy dunes where the giant Scarab Yaoguai called Fuban has emerged, you’ll be in for a battle against a juggernaut of a scarab beetle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fuban.md', within the main section titled 'Fuban', specifically from the subsection 'Fuban Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you make your way down either of the slopes into the large sandy dunes where the giant Scarab Yaoguai called Fuban has emerged, you’ll be in for a battle against a juggernaut of a scarab beetle.
